content: In 2019, which flamboyant musician starred in his own biopic while continuing his farewell tour?

I believe you're referring to Sir Elton John. In 2019, he starred in the biographical film "Rocketman," which chronicled his life and career. At the same time, he was also performing his farewell tour, known as "Farewell Yellow Brick Road." The film and the tour were both significant events in his career, with "Rocketman" receiving critical acclaim and the tour marking the end of his live performances.
